specialEvents.title: Moment of Silence for DeKalb Officer David Rose
specialEvents.description: Mayor Deutsch requested moment of silence in memory of DeKalb Officer David Rose. Chief Carlson noted Dunwoody Police Department is assisting DeKalb Police Department.

specialEvents.title: Officer and Employee of the Second Quarter Awards
specialEvents.description: K9 Officer Elvin Arias and K9 Ranger recognized as Officer of the Second Quarter. Public Safety Ambassador Paul Chastain recognized as Employee of the Second Quarter.

publicHearings.title: Text Amendment for Group Living Uses (First Read)
publicHearings.description: First read of text amendment to create zoning regulations for group living uses including assisted living, independent living, community residences, recovery communities. Clarifies regulations to comply with legal requirements. Planning Commission voted unanimously to approve. One speaker in favor (Zack Humphries), none opposed.

publicHearings.title: RZ 25-02: 4570 Ashford Dunwoody Road Rezoning (First Read)
publicHearings.description: First read of rezoning from O-I to PC-1 for Raising Cane's restaurant. Applicant will submit separate Special Land Use Permit for drive-through. Planning Commission voted unanimously to approve rezoning. Multiple speakers in favor, one opposed (Matthew Munoz from Le Meridien hotel).

publicHearings.title: RZ 25-03: 4981 Ashford Dunwoody Road Rezoning (First Read)
publicHearings.description: First read of rezoning from O-I to PD for 215-unit age-restricted (55+) rental development by Dominion. Planning Commission recommended approval 4-1. Staff recommends approval with conditions. Multiple speakers for and against, with significant public opposition citing density concerns.
publicHearings.presenter: Madalyn Smith, Shaun Reinhardt, and Julie Sellars (applicants)

publicHearings.title: RZ 25-04: 64 & 66 Perimeter Center E Rezoning (First Read)
publicHearings.description: First read of rezoning from O-I to PD for adaptive reuse of office buildings to 441 residential units (condos, age-restricted rentals, townhomes). Planning Commission unanimously recommended approval. Speakers in favor, none opposed.
publicHearings.presenter: Paul Leonhardt, Peter Hansen, and Jessica Hill (applicants)

publicHearings.title: SLUP 25-03: 4515 Chamblee Dunwoody Road Drive-Through (First Read)
publicHearings.description: First read of Special Land Use Permit for Take 5 oil change drive-through facility with two variances. Planning Commission voted 5-0 to deny. Staff recommends denial. No speakers for or against.
publicHearings.presenter: Allegra DeNooyer, Preston Miller, and Laurel David (applicants)
